text:
Hello
Is there anyone who cannot go to the HubSpot GROW Event London and has tickets.

I am happy to buy his tickets.

Thanks

Hello, everyone!

Does anyone know why HubSpot can't filter store filters in the “between values” method for example I want to filter when a property reaches 5 or 10%. When I return, it stores 0% and 0%. I'm really angry about this, does anyone know if it's a bug?

Hello

Happy Friday. We have tried invoking the API through Postman and it has worked, so we conclude that it is the HubSpot interpreter within the custom code in the Workflows.

Has this type of event happened to anyone else?
Hey does anyone know if HubSpot videos have any callbacks? e.g. play pause mute unmute?

Seems to be not a lot out there
<https://gist.github.com/NickDeckerDevs/5213df3ff7e79161bbd15c175e6c6726>

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!

What is the recommendation for sending millions of emails with Single Send transactional email? Is there a limit of how many emails can be in the `to` request body? Our use case is just a one time send.
